participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and determined, Emily is passionate about the law and helping others. She is also nurturing and has a strong connection to her rural roots.
participant_1.background: i want to be a lawyer. my family has raised horses for generations. i am from a small town. i was raised on a horse farm.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, Jake enjoys the thrill of skateboarding and embraces a carefree lifestyle. He is resilient, even after injuries.
participant_2.background: my friends are all skateboarders. i've a broken arm. i am a skateboarder. my favourite skater is rob dryden.
